main event: An oval-shaped object with a bright glow on one side moved slowly across the field of vision, made a sharp turn and moved slowly.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a tail or trailing fuselage type design and was oblong in shape.
The object remained stationary for the duration of the observation, which lasted around 1-2 hours.
The pilots discounted the possibility of it being a weather balloon due to the object's shiny appearance and rapid acceleration.
Other pilots and ground observers in the area also reported similar sightings of the object.
The object disappeared from view after rapidly accelerating and climbing steeply.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object with a bright glow
witnesses: multiple civilian pilots and ground observers
photographs: no, the report does not mention any photographs
